name: get_a_daily_horoscope
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool horoscope_api.
Tool description: Horoscope API - Professional Horoscopes as a simple JSON API - Access 12 horoscopes every day, written by professional astrologers. Important: Only Portuguese (PT) language is currently available.
API description: Fetches the daily horoscope for a given horoscope sign using the specified language and RapidAPI key.

signid.description: The identifier for the horoscope sign.

langid.description: The language identifier for the horoscope.
